trans-unit.source: Maps a XAML element name to the appropriate CLR <see cref="T:System.Type" /> in assemblies.

<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> is part of an advanced WPF scenario that supplies alternate context for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> 属于高级 WPF 方案中，提供备用上下文<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter>。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] WPF applications, you should consider overriding <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext> for this scenario, rather than attempting to use <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper>.
trans-unit.target: 有关[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]WPF 应用程序，你应考虑重写<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>此方案中，而不尝试使用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> can be used to provide the XAML parser with custom mapping information through a more direct technique than the application of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute> values on the assembly code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> 可以用于通过比的应用程序的更直接技术的自定义映射信息与提供 XAML 分析器<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute>上的程序集代码的值。

trans-unit.source: This might be useful for consolidation of all CLR namespaces in an assembly, or for referencing types that are XAML-ready in an existing assembly without having to recompile it just to add <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute> attributing.
trans-unit.target: 这可能很有用： 合并的程序集中的所有 CLR 命名空间; 二是引用类型包含 XAML 准备就绪，可以在现有程序集而无需重新编译它只是为了增加<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute>特性设置。

trans-unit.source: You typically create a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> instance in order to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext.XamlTypeMapper%2A> property value for a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext>.
trans-unit.target: 通常创建<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper>实例，以指定<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext.XamlTypeMapper%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext> in turn can be used as the context for a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Markup.ParserContext%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext>反过来可用作的上下文<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Markup.ParserContext%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用。

trans-unit.source: Default Mapper
trans-unit.target: 默认映射器

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a default mapper using the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.DefaultMapper%2A> static property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取默认映射程序使用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.DefaultMapper%2A>静态属性。

trans-unit.source: The default mapper only works on a default assembly list.
trans-unit.target: 默认映射器仅适用于默认程序集列表。

trans-unit.source: No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> constructors) is used.
trans-unit.target: 有关程序集没有特定信息 (如中指定<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper>构造函数) 使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> class.
The array of assembly names the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> should use.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> class by specifying an array of assembly names that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> should use.
<paramref name="assemblyNames" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The array of assembly names the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> should use.
The array of namespace maps the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> should use.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> class, using the specified array of assembly names and the specified namespace maps.
<paramref name="assemblyNames" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The prefix for the XML namespace..
The CLR namespace that contains the types to map.
The assembly that contains the CLR namespace.
Defines a mapping between an XML namespace and CLR namespaces in assemblies, and adds these to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> information.
<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AddMappingProcessingInstruction%2A> is a programmatic way to add a mapping.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AddMappingProcessingInstruction%2A> 是以编程方式添加映射。

trans-unit.source: For example, the different parts of the following XAML mapping instruction correspond to the parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AddMappingProcessingInstruction%2A>:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的 XAML 映射指令的不同部分对应的参数<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AddMappingProcessingInstruction%2A>:

trans-unit.source: The `xmlNamespace` is `SDK`, the `clrNamespace` is `Samples`, and the `assemblyName` is `SDKSamples`.
trans-unit.target: `xmlNamespace`是`SDK`、`clrNamespace`是`Samples`，和`assemblyName`是`SDKSamples`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="xmlNamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />
-or-
<paramref name="clrNamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />
-or-
<paramref name="assemblyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The type to access.
Requests permission for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> derived type that is called under full trust to access a specific internal type.
<see langword="true" /> if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
If not overridden by a subclass, <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AllowInternalType%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有重写子类，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AllowInternalType%2A>始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When overridden by a subclass, the behavior should be that <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AllowInternalType%2A> should return `true` if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: 由子类中重写时, 的行为应不<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AllowInternalType%2A>应返回`true`如果内部类型可以访问; 否则为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> to use if one has not been specified.
The default type mapper.
trans-unit.target: 默认类型映射器。

trans-unit.source: The default mapper only works on a default assembly list.
trans-unit.target: 默认映射器仅适用于默认程序集列表。

trans-unit.source: No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> constructors) is used.
trans-unit.target: 有关程序集没有特定信息 (如中指定<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper>构造函数) 使用。

trans-unit.source: In the current implementation the default assembly list is: `WindowsBase`, `PresentationCore`, `PresentationFramework`.
trans-unit.target: 在当前实现中的默认程序集列表是： `WindowsBase`， `PresentationCore`， `PresentationFramework`。

trans-unit.source: Using the default mapper does not mean that you cannot use custom assemblies/types in XAML at all.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认映射器并不意味着，你根本无法使用自定义的程序集类型在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: It only means that if you do use custom types/assemblies, you must then use the conventional XAML technique of creating the mappings as `xmlns` attributes in each XAML page where the types/assemblies are referenced, as opposed to a type mapper API.
trans-unit.target: 它仅意味着如果你使用自定义类型/程序集，你必须再使用作为映射创建传统的 XAML 技术`xmlns`每个 XAML 页面，其中引用类型/程序集，而不是类型映射器 API 中的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified XML namespace prefix.
The "local" name of the XAML element to obtain the mapped <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for.
Local in this context means as mapped versus the provided <c>xmlNamespace</c>.
Gets the CLR <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that a given XAML element is mapped to, using the specified XML namespace prefix and element name.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the object, or <see langword="null" /> if no mapping could be resolved.
If a type cannot be found that maps to the provided information, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法找到一种类型，映射到提供的信息，`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: Do not include the prefix as part of `localName`.
trans-unit.target: 不作为的一部分包括前缀`localName`。

trans-unit.source: For any prefixed XAML element information, separate it into `xmlNamespace` and `localName` components for this API call.
trans-unit.target: 对于任何前缀 XAML 元素的信息，将其分隔成`xmlNamespace`和`localName`此 API 调用的组件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="xmlNamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />
-or-
<paramref name="localName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The short name of the assembly without an extension or path specified (equivalent to <see cref="P:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name" />).
The file path of the assembly.
The assembly path must be a full file path containing a file extension.
Specifies the path to use when loading an assembly.
<paramref name="assemblyName" /> is <see langword="null" />
-or-
<paramref name="assemblyPath" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="assemblyName" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />
-or-
<paramref name="assemblyPath" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />
-or-
<paramref name="assemblyPath" /> is not a full file path containing a file extension.
